text: a light-colored cow with large horns is grazing in a grassy field, wearing a bell around its neck.
a young brown cow lies on a grassy field, looking directly at the camera with a calm expression.
a brown cow with curved horns is resting in a grassy field, with flies buzzing around its face.
a brown and white cow stands on a grassy hill, with a distant signpost and a cloudy sky overhead.
a brown and white cow stands in a grassy field with trees in the background, wearing a chain collar.
